using namespace std;

int main(){

    int count = 1;

    char main_char = '{';
    char c = s[i];

            if ( c == aux ){
               count++;
            }
            else{
                 if (max < count){
                    max = count;
                    main_char = aux;
                 }
                 else if(max == count && ((int)main_char > (int)aux)){
                      max = count;
                      main_char = aux;
                 }
                 aux = c;
                 count = 1;
            }
            i++;
            c = s[i];
    }
    if (max < count){
       max = count;
       main_char = aux;
    }
    else if(max == count && ((int)main_char > (int)aux)){
       max = count;

    }
        cout<<main_char<<endl;

}
